card_pen_effect: If another "Dinomist" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect, you can destroy this card instead.
card_text: You can Tribute 1 other "Dinomist" monster, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●This card can attack your opponent directly this turn.$N●This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn.
